main event: A bright multi-colored light was observed oscillating in the sky during a UFO sighting report.
interesting points: The light was brighter than a full moon and exploded with a brilliant white flash., The object was reportedly traveling in a straight line from NW to SE., There were no photographs attached to the report., The object was observed for several minutes without any reported sound., Another pilot in the area reported seeing a similar object shortly before this sighting.
witness description: civilian observations from a high-altitude aircraft
